title: Solifer
text:
Solifer Oy is a <a href="Finland">Finnish</a> manufacturer of <a href="bicycle">bicycle</a>s, <a href="boat">boat</a>s, <a href="moped">moped</a>s, and <a href="travel%20trailer">travel trailer</a>s. The company was founded in 1954 and it started as a <a href="dynamo">dynamo</a> manufacturer. Nowadays, the company's bicycles are manufactured in <a href="Poland">Poland</a>, boats in Finland, mopeds in <a href="China">China</a>, and travel trailers in <a href="Dorotea">Dorotea</a>, <a href="Sweden">Sweden</a>.
Mopeds.
Alongside <a href="Tunturi">Tunturi</a>, Solifer was one of the significant moped manufactures in Finland from the late 1950s to the mid-1980s. During 1958–1984, around 175,000 Solifer mopeds were manufactured, of which over 20,000 were exported outside Finland. Solifer was distributed by AB Bensow Oy - Managing Director Stig Gunnar Damstrom.
With c.1,200 registrations in the first half-year of 2010, China-manufactured Solifer BT49QT was the most registered moped in Finland at that time.
